resources.string: "%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Internet connection not allowed. Enable it in App permissions.
Album and artist art will not be not automatically downloaded when your device is in data saver mode.
Delete images stored by the Music application
Album art. Tap for menu. Swipe to change song.
Download will start when you have a network connection
Please make sure that album name is specified and then try again
Please make sure that both artist and album are specified and then try again
Please make sure that artist name is specified and then try again
This feature is not available anymore
"Couldn't connect to Google Drive. Please try again."
In order to access your Google Drive account, Music needs \"Contacts\" permission
Searching for music on your Google Drive
Your music on Google Drive - access it from anywhere
Sign in to Google Drive to:
Could not connect to Google Drive. Check your internet connection.
If you have music stored on your Google Drive, you can stream or download directly from the Music app.
Stream music from your Google Drive account

"Music looks better with album and artist art. To improve your experience, the app will update the available art where it is missing - while you play your music.
This setting can be further configured in Music settings."

This is your Xperia identifier. It can be used to personalize some of your favorite Sony services.
